Column.Name: End Date
Column.Formula: COALESCE( [End Date], DATEADD( "day", 14, COALESCE([Announcement Date], NOW()) ) )

Column.Name: Parent Structure

Binding.Expression: IF( [Mode] <> "Edit", "Switch to Edit Mode", "Switch to Read Mode" )

Label.Text: You are attempting to delete record <record> of <eform>. You cannot restore or recover a record once deleted. Are you sure you wish to continue?

Binding.Expression: "You are attempting to delete record #"&[RecordID] &" of " &[EFormType]&". You cannot restore or recover a record once deleted." & NEWLINE() & "Are you sure you wish to continue?"

FieldEntry.Formula:
IF( OR( ISBLANK([Announcement Date]), ISBLANK([End Date]) ), "Draft",
TODAY([Announcement Date]) > TODAY(), "Future",
TODAY([End Date]) < TODAY(), "Past",
"Current" )
